contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox Italian comune | name = Irma | official_name = Comune di Irma | native_name = | image_skyline = | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_shield = Irma (BS)-Stemma.png | shield_alt = | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | latd = 45 |latm = 46 |lats = |latNS = N | longd = 10 |longm = 17 |longs = |longEW = E | coordinates_type = region:IT_type:city(155) | coordinates_display = title | coordinates_footnotes = | region = {{RegioneIT|sigla=LOM}} | province = {{ProvinciaIT (short form)|sigla=BS}} (BS) | frazioni = | mayor_party = | mayor = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 4 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 155 | population_as_of = | pop_density_footnotes = | population_demonym = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | twin1 = | twin1_country = | saint = | day = | postal_code = 25061 | area_code = 030 | website = | footnotes = }} '''Irma''' is a town and ''[[comune]]'' in the [[province of Brescia]], in [[Lombardy]].<!-- It is bounded by other communes of--> {{Province of Brescia}} [[Category:Cities and towns in Lombardy]] {{Brescia-geo-stub}}
